#summary ElementHandler handles any HTML Element.

= leaf.ElementHandler =
== Description ==
Handles HTML Elements fixing compatibility problems. It's a real JavaScript prototype, so will save memory. The ElementHandler provides nice methods to ease style control with an amazing performance.
